# Hurakon
## Overview
Name: Hurakon

Gender: m

Rank: Demigod

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Floods, Unrestrained Fury

Titles: God of the Flood

Holy Symbol: Floodwaters

Alignment: CN

Origin of Worship: Olman

Core Worshippers: Olman

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Spear

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: *+1 thundering spear*

Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Water, Weather\* (CD).
